transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Jakham tech hello.
Executive: Sir Sushmita baat kar rahi thi Indiamart se.
Customer: Haan ji haan madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir aap bataiye actually aapne ticket open kiya tha na regarding your services. Meri aapse baat hui thi Saturday ko right?
Customer: Madam baat aisi hai ji woh toh baad ki baat hai ji. Madam te main aapko 10 minute baad mein kar lu main jot laga raha tha.
Executive: Agar koi dikkat nahi ek baar aap. Bas main abhi karta hu ji back call karta hu aapko. Ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to call back in 10 minutes.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to receive a call back.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call back, services, ticket
